title: Yoshimune
synopsis: It is the end of the Edo Era, a flourishing period when stylish civilians, samurai and old-fashioned farmers live peacefully together.
staff: [['Shioya, Yoku', ['Sound Director']], ['Hasegawa, Nahoko', ['Script']], ['Nakagawa, Shoko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Ikeda, Shigemi', ['Art Director']]]
